version_description:
- XL guys, now you can learn more about our Extra features and how to use them to maximize your XL experience
- Daily Bonus is now available: welcome, FORTUNE WHEEL. You can spin it to earn extra features and sweet bonuses for free.
- You can verify your email to get 5 chat requests as a bonus
- Photo upload should be working faster

- Stories are finally here! Create your own or watch uploaded ones in the Digest section.
Don't forget to send your likes and emotions after watching
- Fixed email links for proper app openings
- Improved app stability and performance
More features are coming soon. Stay tuned!

– Hey, have you seen user stories @Finder section? The more videos you upload the more likes you get!
– Groups are finally available on Taimi. Join new groups or create your own one and get your own followers ;)
– You can upload Stories from your phone library
– You can send your private videos in a dialogue
– If you switched on the Stealth-mode you'll see it in a tab
– In-app notifications can be swiped up if you wish to dismiss them
Thanks for using our app!

– Brand new profile look with FOLLOW button
– Follow people you're interested in and we'll show you only relevant posts really soon
– Messages are loading even faster
– You might see an ability to add some text to your stories
– You can pin your important dialogues to top of messages section for your convenience

– Now you can upload more pictures to your profile with XL
– If you wish to add some features to our application, there's a special form for requesting one
– If someone takes a screenshot of your profile or a dialogue with you'll be immediately notified in case of privacy concerns
– Top picks section is available at Notifications section with recommended guys for you
– Now you can clear a conversation on both sides or delete a specific message in a dialogue
– Repost is also finally available for you

– Now you can upload more pictures to your profile with XL
– If you wish to add some features to our application, there's a special form for requesting one
– If someone takes a screenshot of your profile or a dialogue with you'll be immediately notified in case of privacy concerns
– Top picks section is available at Notifications section with recommended guys for you
– Now you can clear a conversation on both sides or delete a specific message in a dialogue
– Repost is also finally available for you

– Improved app's performance
– Add your comments to photos
– New typing indicator in a dialogue
– Brand new online badge
– Share profiles with your friends

– New fullscreen match screen
– You've requested and we made it! Now you can send a voice messages in private dialogues. Try it!
– You can also share you location in private dialogue
– Stories will be grouped per person
– You can share any posts from Taimi to any other apps

— share your snapchat and instagram usernames at your profile and adjust who can see them
— swipe up to open profile at finder
— view top-rated stories in one place
— profile verification via snapchat
— performance improvements

#so #cool #to #have #hashtags
Now you won't lose your typed message if you were distracted from your chat.
Don’t want to show your age or where you from? — hide it!
When you start your Taimi, we will remind you now about mutuals you’ve missed.
Now you can see the list of people who granted access for private photos in one place
Onboarding is even better now.

#so #cool #to #have #hashtags
Now you won't lose your typed message if you were distracted from your chat.
Don’t want to show your age or where you from? — hide it!
When you start your Taimi, we will remind you now about mutuals you’ve missed.
Now you can see the list of people who granted access for private photos in one place
Onboarding is even better now.

You can now unlike someone if you’ve changed your mind
Add as many photos as you want, more pictures — more likes
See who connected insta or snap accounts to their profiles in finder
Possibility to delete your main photo if you have other photos in your album

— new search screen with recommendations
— onboarding improvements
— trending and popular hashtags
— possibility to add a video to your post
— bug fixes

- New App Icon with our Brand name: Taimi... not Tammi, not Timmi etc
- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Now you can enjoy Taimi in Italian!
- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- A special chat for cats that use Taimi from the phones of their owners.

- We have added amazing Digest promo for you, join best groups created for you.
- Your favourite video calls will work much better now!
- You can change language preferences in Settings.

- Now you can enjoy LGBTQI+ Taimi!
- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Promised ourselves to eat healthy from Monday!

- Added Sign In with Apple opportunity!
- Find out which story is used by user in Finder.
- If you read to this point, you'll get lucky!

- Added Sign In with Apple opportunity!
- Find out which story is used by user in Finder.
- If you read to this point, you'll get lucky!

- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Do you like Taimi? You have a good taste!

- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Do you like Taimi? You have a good taste!

- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Do you like Taimi? You have a good taste!

- Prepared for you Halloween version of Taimi!
- Collected all jack o'lanterns by #taimihalloween.
- Happy Halloween!

- Share your music playlist for your matches;
- Try to share interesting posts with your friends;
- Moreover, we added more love in this version!
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Find out our special deals this Black Friday! #blackfridaydeal #taimideals
- Stars have aligned and our new Astrology Functional is ready! Check if you are compatible with your match.
- Breaking news! Now you can check the Statistics of your account (track your likes, comments, reactions, etc.).
Some bug fixes and improvements

- We are ready to show you Taimi on iPads! More ways to find the right connection.
- Added the opportunity to like messages in dialogues - great lifehack when you don't know what to answer.
- Added a little Xmas magic - find out our special deals for holidays.

- We are ready to show you Taimi on iPads! More ways to find the right connection.
- Added the opportunity to like messages in dialogues - great lifehack when you don't know what to answer.
- Added a little Xmas magic - find out our special deals for holidays.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- We are ready to show you Taimi on iPads! More ways to find the right connection.
- Added the opportunity to like messages in dialogues - great lifehack when you don't know what to answer.

Stay at home, chat on Taimi.
We are always here to support you.

With love,
Taimi Team

Stay at home, chat on Taimi.
We are always here to support you.

With love,
Taimi Team
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

Chat online & use our Video Calls to meet new people. Be safe, friends.

Lots of love and support,
Taimi Team

Now you can:
- Zoom your stories during recording.
- Edit your posts in the digest.
- Create private posts.
- Quickly search Taimi on your iPhone.

Lots of love and support,
Taimi Team
- Bug fixes

Love you even more with this update.
- Now you can mention your friend in a post.
- Minor improvements.
You can edit sent messages! It's easier to chat with your partner now.

- Digest interface got improved and several minor bugs were fixed
- #TaimiInfluencer participants got a new badge
- Check out recent posts from people nearby
- bug fixes and improvements

Here is the latest release of your favourite TAIMI app.
- Customise who you see in Discovery by adjusting the filters
- Link your Instagram and Spotify to connect through photos and music
- Search #TaimiInfluencer in Digest to see what our influencers have to share
- Don't like comments under your posts in Digest? Long press to delete or report them. Let's make TAIMI a safe space

Latest release of your favorite TAIMI app is ready.
- Light it up. Added flashlight to the Story recording and Video Calls
- Get connected through Suggested Friends feature
- Join our hashtag challenges in TAIMI Digest
- Video calls got a minor fix
Enjoying TAIMI app? Leave us a kind app review and invite your friends to join the world's largest LGBTQ+ platform!
- Bug fixes

Latest update of your favourite TAIMI app is out!
- Watch Alyssa Edwards, Jason Wimberlean and many more in live streaming series Taimi Talks on Sep 12-13
- Check Digest to see cool posts and stories from popular people and those who are near you
- Add friends in Stories and long press on emoji icon to choose one of the fun reacts
- Join #cosplay challenge and win Amazon gift card

The latest update of your favorite Taimi app is out!
- Live streaming feature in Digest got several bugs fixed
- Change your location in filters to hang out with locals all around the world
- Check out the Popular category in Digest
- Profile tags got a huge update. Add some to make your profile stand out
- Have got a Spotify account? Add it to your profile so others see what kind of music you are fond of
Try the Live Duet feature with your best friend and earn diamonds every time you go live!
Introducing new versus mode for live streaming
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

Now you can invite your friends to battle with you in streams!
Find best streams in digest feed

Now you can invite your friends to battle with you in streams!
Find best streams in digest feed
Several updates for our streamers. Start streaming and try all new features!
- Bug fixes
